Page Title: Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: MOSDAC is the short form of Meteorological and Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Center. It is a ISRO data portal which provides data through its web based servicehttps://mosdac.gov.in

Page Title: Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Please copy the Email verification Hyperlink sent on your registered email id and paste it in a new browser window/tab and open the link to verify your email address.

Page Title: Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Please copy the 'Reset Password Hyperlink' sent on your registered  email id and past it in a new browser window/tab and open the link to reset password.

Page Title: Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Your account is locked for one hour after 3 unsuccessful login attempts. Please try after one hour.

Page Title: Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: You are required to be a registered user for ordering the data. Be a registered user by filling up Sing Up form Available on the home page. Login to MOSDAC site with user credentials,  Select  "Satellite data order" . Select the data of your interest.Add to cart. submit the request. You will be given a request id no. You will be intimated through the mail about readiness of your data. You can also check status of your request from left menu under "My request tab"

Page Title: Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Your requested data will be uploaded to your SFTP account atsftp://ftp.mosdac.gov.in. You can download data fromsftp://ftp.mosdac.gov.inusing your MOSDAC portal user credentials.

Page Title: Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Select "Catalog --> Satellite data" from top menu bar. All data products list of a satellite will be displayed. You can change the satellite to view data products of selected satellite.

Page Title: Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
Text Content: Select"Catalog --> In-situ --> distribution" from top menu bar. All In-situ list will be displayed for which MOSDAC has datasets.

Page Title: Meteorological & Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
